long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you from the University of Calgary and wish that you were able to write code in D2L textboxes? Do you wish for a dark theme for D2L? Then, try the D2L Coding extension! This extension adds support for inserting tabs using the Tab key on your keyboard, like in a text editor. It also adds a dark theme to D2L, which you can turn on or off as you wish by using the extension's interface.
